summary: Provides foundational classes for constructing SEAWAT groundwater‑model packages, including utilities for defining transient boundary conditions (e.g., recharge, constant head, river, drainage) and for managing package metadata, validation, composition, and rendering of model input sections.
business_intent: Enable users to programmatically configure and generate the input files required for SEAWAT simulations, ensuring accurate time‑dependent boundary condition handling and consistent package data preparation for reliable groundwater modeling workflows.
